title: Social Studies Learning Enhancement Program Utilizing 3D Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theory and experience with digital platform usage
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum combining instructor avatar guidance with self-directed inquiry in smartphone-based 3D virtual environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of core social studies concepts by following instructor avatar guidance in a 3D virtual world
Learners complete and submit social issue-solving projects based on virtual world experiences with over 90% completion rates
Learners self-evaluate immersive flow experiences in a 3D virtual learning environment at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
